author: Staff Reporter
text:
Uthangarai sessions court here on Tuesday acquitted 19 Viduthalai Chiruthaigal Katchi cadre in a case pertaining to setting ablaze a bus in 2001.According to the prosecution, the cadre damaged public property and set ablaze a bus following the preventive arrest of VCK leader Thol. Thirumavalavan at Shoolakarai in Uthangarai in 2001.

In a verdict, 15 years later, the sessions court judge Suganthi acquitted the cadre citing lack of proof of their guilt.
title: 19 VCK cadre acquitted
